review: This thing is great; installation was a breeze (literally plug and play!) and now the 5000 plus family photos that reside on the computer are available for viewing on our tv, either as a slide show with music from our iTunes, or as a screen saver while the Apple TV is idle. Works beautifully with amazon prime, Netflix, etc. with plenty of free content from Crackle, PBS, etc. It also allows me to stream content from our iPads and iPod touch, which is a great way to share photos and videos with a group of people.
author: Doppler Man

review: I was looking forward to this as a Christmas present, and to say this is a disappointment is an EXTREME understatement.Slow user interface, no app support for anything Ultraviolet (flixster, vudu, best buy, etc) - somehow iPad and iPhone have no issue here.Buffering is close to miserable on a hard wired line to my Mac....not even worth the $100....save your money to buy something that has a little better flexibility (Xbox, PS3, and Roku have much nicer interfaces) - Roku is even cheaper.
